docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Equal Employment Opportunity Commission filed a lawsuit yesterday against Chase Manhattan Bank and the insurer that provides its disability benefits, the Unum Life Insurance Company of America, for limiting benefits to bank workers with mental illnesses. The commission contends that the Chase policy violates the Americans With Disabilities Act by denying benefits to mentally ill workers that are routinely given to employees with physical disabilities.

headline.main: Lawsuit Says Chase Abuses Mentally Ill

docs.abstract: United States Equal Employment Opportunity Commission files lawsuit against Chase Manhattan Bank and insurer that provides its disability benefits, Unum Life Insurance Co of America, for limiting benefits to bank workers with mental illnesses (M)

keywords.value: UNUM LIFE INSURANCE CO OF AMERICA

docs.lead_paragraph: In the shadow of big names like MSNBC and CNN/SI that have moved on to television in recent years are a rising number of smaller channels and programs that are bringing Irish boxing, Indian music and Russian, Chinese and Filipino news to the living rooms of immigrants and other Americans around the country. While these programs may not have big budgets, they are showing considerable growth, gathering loyal audiences and cautious support from advertisers.

headline.main: Newscasts in Tagalog and Songs in Gaelic

docs.abstract: Ethnic television programming is expanding in US immigrant markets; while programs may not have big budgets, they are showing considerable growth, gathering loyal audiences and cautious support from advertisers; some specific programs discussed; photo (L)

docs.lead_paragraph: AS it has become easier in the last two years to win a patent for software, more computer programs for managing life have emerged with exclusive rights from the Patent and Trademark Office. Among those are software inventions intended to make financial analyses for consumers and then generate a recommendation of the best product or service to buy. The advantage of having a computer program make the choice is that software can examine competitive data from hundreds or thousands of sources. In the market for a long-distance telephone service? Just try by yourself to uncover all the plans available, get their sales brochures, and then break down the pricing structures to determine which one is the most economical for your needs.

headline.main: Software programs to help buyers make decisions about insurance and health care needs.

docs.abstract: Patent and Trademark Office awards patent to Ryan Evalulife Systems Inc that covers software program to help individuals choose universal life insurance policy; Health Share Technology Inc is assigneed patent that covers software that compares quality and cost of health care at hospitals to determine which are most competitive (L)
